mapper.select: SELECT id, cancer_idx, stage_idx, profile_photo, intro, profile_yn, access_cnt FROM profile WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY access_cnt DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE profile SET cancer_idx = #{cancer_idx}, stage_idx = #{stage_idx}, profile_photo = #{profile_photo}, intro = #{intro}, profile_yn = #{profile_yn} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile (id, cancer_idx, stage_idx, profile_photo, intro, profile_yn, access_cnt) VALUES (#{id}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0, 0)
